arts.ttl: Balotelli’s future at Genoa hangs in the balance as Mexican Interest emerges
arts.sum: Mario Balotelli's stint at Genoa has been off to a rocky start, with the 34-year-old striker accumulating just 56 minutes of playing time across six substitute appearances since joining the club in late October. The Italian forward's future with the Grifone is now uncertain as the year draws to a close, with a crucial decision looming on the horizon. The post Balotelli’s future at Genoa hangs in the balance as Mexican Interest emerges appeared first on FootItalia.com.

arts.ttl: Serie A | Empoli 1-2 Genoa: Match Report
arts.sum: Empoli faced a disappointing 2-1 defeat at home against Genoa, a match that saw them squander a crucial penalty opportunity. The goals from Milan Badelj and Caleb Ekuban secured the win for the visitors, leaving Empoli to reflect on missed chances. arts.ttl: Serie A | Empoli v Genoa: Probable starting lineups
arts.sum: As Empoli prepare to close out the year, they face a challenging situation with their injury list ahead of their match with Genoa. Pietro Pellegri and Ola Solbakken lead a group of sidelined players that also includes Szymon Zurkowski, Tyronne Ebuehi, Saba Sazonov, and Nicolas Haas. The post Serie A | Empoli v Genoa: Probable starting lineups appeared first on FootItalia.com.

Genoa are unbeaten in their last nine matches against Empoli in Serie A (W4 D5), drawing each of the last four; the Grifone could draw more consecutive games against a single opponent in the competition for the first time since the period between 1983 and 1990 against Fiorentina (five in that case). Considering the last match of the calendar year in Serie A, Genoa have won only one of their last 15 games (D5 L9): 2-1 against Spezia on 23rd December 2020.
